deployment-hook.Description: Update a deployment hook on a deployment config

env.Description: Update environment variables on a pod template

image.Description: Update the image of a pod template

probe.Description: Update a probe on a pod template

resources.Description: Update resource requests/limits on objects with pod templates

selector.Description: Set the selector on a resource

serviceaccount.Description: Update the service account of a resource

volumes.Description: Update volumes on a pod template

data.Description: Update the data within a config map or secret

build-secret.Description: Update a build secret on a build config

build-hook.Description: Update a build hook on a build config

image-lookup.Description: Change how images are resolved when deploying applications

triggers.Description: Update the triggers on one or more objects

route-backends.Description: Update the backends for a route

subject.Description: Update the user, group, or service account in a role binding or cluster role binding
